auth.failed: The credentials you entered are incorrect.
auth.password: The password you entered is incorrect.
auth.throttle: Too many failed attempts. Please try again in :seconds seconds.
passwords.sent: We have emailed your password reset link.
passwords.token: This password reset token is invalid.
passwords.user: We can't find a user with that email address.
validation.active_url: :attribute does not contain a valid URL.
validation.after_or_equal: :attribute must be a date after or equal to :date.
validation.alpha_dash: :attribute may only contain letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.
validation.alpha_num: :attribute may only contain letters and numbers.
validation.ascii: :attribute must only contain single-byte alphanumeric characters and symbols.
validation.before_or_equal: :attribute must be a date before or equal to :date.
validation.can: The :attribute field contains an unauthorized value.
validation.contains: The :attribute field is missing a required value.
validation.date_equals: :attribute must be a date equal to :date.
validation.doesnt_contain: The :attribute field must not contain any of the following: :values.
validation.doesnt_end_with: :attribute must not end with one of the following: :values.
validation.doesnt_start_with: :attribute must not start with one of the following: :values.
validation.email: :attribute must be a valid email address.
validation.encoding: The :attribute field must be encoded in :encoding.
validation.ends_with: :attribute must end with one of the following: :values.
validation.extensions: The :attribute field must have one of the following extensions: :values.
validation.gte.file: :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value kilobytes.
validation.gte.numeric: :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value.
validation.hex_color: The :attribute field must be a valid hexadecimal color.
validation.in_array_keys: The :attribute field must contain at least one of the following keys: :values.
validation.ip: :attribute must be a valid IP address.
validation.ipv4: :attribute must be a valid IPv4 address.
validation.ipv6: :attribute must be a valid IPv6 address.
validation.json: :attribute must contain a valid JSON string.
validation.list: The :attribute field must be a list.
validation.lte.array: :attribute must not contain more than :value items.
validation.lte.file: :attribute must be less than or equal to :value kilobytes.
validation.lte.numeric: :attribute must be less than or equal to :value.
validation.lte.string: :attribute must not contain more than :value characters.
validation.mac_address: :attribute must be a valid MAC address.
validation.max.array: :attribute may not contain more than :max items.
validation.max.file: :attribute may not be greater than :max kilobytes.
validation.max.string: :attribute may not be greater than :max characters.
validation.max_digits: :attribute may not contain more than :max digits.
validation.mimes: :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.mimetypes: :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.missing_with: :attribute must be missing when :values is present.
validation.missing_with_all: :attribute must be missing when :values are present.
validation.password.letters: :attribute must contain at least one letter.
validation.password.mixed: :attribute must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
validation.password.numbers: :attribute must contain at least one number.
validation.password.symbols: :attribute must contain at least one symbol.
validation.password.uncompromised: :attribute appears in a data breach. Please choose a different :attribute.
validation.present_with: :attribute must be present when :values is present.
validation.present_with_all: :attribute must be present when :values are present.
validation.prohibited_if_accepted: The :attribute field is prohibited when :other is accepted.
validation.prohibited_if_declined: The :attribute field is prohibited when :other is declined.
validation.required_if_declined: The :attribute field is required when :other is declined.
validation.required_without: :attribute is required when :values is not present.
validation.required_without_all: :attribute is required when none of :values are present.
validation.starts_with: :attribute must start with one of the following: :values.
validation.unique: The :attribute field is already in use.

mail.subcopy:
If you're having trouble clicking the ":actionText\" button, copy and paste the URL below
into your web browser:
notifications.new_user_registered.line_1: A new user has registered on the portal. After they confirm their email address, they will be able to access the private area.
notifications.new_user_registered.line_2: Make sure to associate the profile with one or more buildings if you want the user to be able to view their data.
notifications.reset_password.subject: Password Reset Notification
notifications.reset_password.line_1: You are receiving this email because we received a password reset request for your account.
notifications.reset_password.line_2: This reset link will expire in :count minutes.
notifications.reset_password.line_3: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.
notifications.verify_email.subject: Verify Email Address
notifications.verify_email.line_1: Please click the button below to verify your email address.
notifications.verify_email.line_2: If you did not create an account, please ignore this email.
notifications.invite_user.subject: Welcome to :appName
notifications.invite_user.line_1: The condominium administrator has invited you to register your online account.
notifications.invite_user.line_2: This invitation will expire in three days.
notifications.new_user_created.subject: Welcome to :appName
notifications.new_user_created.line_1: The condominium administrator has created your profile. Click the link below to set your password.
notifications.new_user_created.line_2: This link will expire in 60 minutes.
notifications.approve_communication.line: User :user has created a new communication on the condominium notice board.
The communication is pending approval because the user who submitted it does not have sufficient permissions to publish it.
notifications.approved_communication.lin: User :user has approved the communication on the condominium notice board.
notifications.new_communication.subject: New communication on the notice board
notifications.new_communication.line_1: User :user has created a new communication on the condominium notice board.
notifications.approved_document.subject: Document approved
notifications.approved_document.line_1: User :user has approved the document in the condominium archive.
notifications.approved_document.title: Title
notifications.approve_document.subject: New document pending approval
notifications.approve_document.line_1: User :user has created a new document in the condominium archive.
notifications.approve_document.line_2: The document is waiting for approval because the user who submitted it does not have sufficient permissions to publish it.
notifications.approve_document.title: Title
notifications.new_document.subject: New document in the archive
notifications.new_document.line_1: User :user has published a new document in the condominium archive.
notifications.new_document.title: Title
notifications.approved_ticket.subject: New fault report approved
notifications.approved_ticket.line_1: User :user has approved the fault report.
notifications.approve_ticket.subject: New ticket pending approval
notifications.approve_ticket.line_1: User :user has created a new fault ticket for the condominium.
notifications.approve_ticket.line_2: The ticket is waiting for approval because the user who submitted it does not have sufficient permissions to publish it.
notifications.new_ticket.subject: New fault ticket
notifications.new_ticket.line_1: User :user has created a new fault ticket.
notifications.common.trouble_with_button: If you're having trouble clicking the ":actionText" button, copy and paste the URL below into your browser:
notifications.common.no_reply: Please do not reply to this email.
notifications.common.auto_generated: This is an automatically generated email.

users.header.new_user_description: Below you can create a new user. You can assign a role, a resident record and specific permissions for this user

and will be automatically assigned to the user

users.tooltip.role_line_1: Select the role to assign to the user. Choose from default roles or one you created.
users.tooltip.role_line_2: Permissions associated with the role will be inherited automatically.
users.tooltip.resident: Select the resident record to associate with the user. The associated resident record will be able to access the system with the credentials of the created user and view their data and related information.
users.tooltip.permissions: Select specific permissions to assign to the user in addition to those inherited from the selected role.
